sentence.Network_en: Results Amikacin solution may reduce inflammation of incision of lateral episiotomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果采用阿米卡星溶液护理会阴侧切伤口能减轻炎症反应.

sentence.Network_en: Abstract: Objective : To study the effection of using metronidazole to wound to prevent episiotomy infect.
sentence.Network_cn: 文摘: 目的: 探讨产后应用甲硝唑擦洗预防会阴切口感染的作用.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: The metronidazole to episiotomy wound at postpartum to prevent infection is safe and effective.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 产后应用甲硝唑注射液擦洗会阴及切口,可有效预防伤口感染,有利于伤口愈合.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学翻译词汇七 ... episcope ① 反射投影灯 ②物面检查器 episiotomy 外阴切开术 episiotomy scissors 会阴剪，外阴切开剪.
会阴切开术(episiotomy)是妇产科手术中最常见的手术,在第二产程时进行。适时的会阴切开有助于保护盆底软组织,避免其过度伸展及胎头长时间压迫造成的组织损伤.

postero - lateral episiotomy ., 会阴后 － 侧切开术.

medio-lateral episiotomy 会阴中侧切median episiotomy 会阴正中切开cervicotomy 宫颈切开术
图文 1.会阴正中切开术(Median Episiotomy) 胎头拨露时即予消毒外阴,铺好无菌巾、单。局麻或阴部神经阻滞麻醉下。胎头一着冠,趁宫缩间歇,伸两手指入阴道撑起会阴体.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek epision 'pubic region' + -tomy

means.word_mean: 1. surgical incision of the perineum to enlarge the vagina and so facilitate delivery during childbirth
